Stop-loss strategy: Sell when the stock price falls by 15% or when ROE and ROA turn negative again.
If the stock price falls by 8% from the current price, trigger a sell order.
Close below 16 NTD and then close below 14 NTD, trigger sell order.
Trigger a sell order when the stock price falls by 20% from the current price, or when the ROE and EPS show consecutive declines.
Trigger a sell order when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or when the EPS drops below -0.5.
